replies.creator: claudeai
replies.reply_text: Been running Sonnet 4.6 since yesterday and the agent planning upgrade is real. My automation workflows that needed Opus before now run perfectly on Sonnet. Genuinely saves me $50/day.

replies.creator: AnthropicAI
replies.reply_text: This is the kind of AI expansion that actually matters. Health and education infrastructure powered by AI in places that need it most, not just another chatbot wrapper launch.

replies.creator: alexalbert__
replies.reply_text: 32% fewer input tokens while getting better results is the kind of efficiency gain that compounds fast. Running this on my content research pipeline today.

replies.creator: levelsio
replies.reply_text: The Telegram integration is what makes this click. Chatting with your production server to fix bugs feels illegal but I've been doing the same thing for 3 weeks now. Total game changer for solo operators.
